item.title: Arctic tundra now emits planet-warming pollution, federal report finds
item.description: Arctic tundra is releasing greenhouse gases into the atmosphere as hotter temperatures melt frozen ground and wildfires increase.

item.title: Taiwan's Defense Ministry says a large Chinese military force has been detected nearby
item.description: China's secretive military appears to be up to something around Taiwan, but it's unclear whether it's a formal military drill.

item.title: 'If I can stay funny, I can stay alive,' Jamie Foxx says in Netflix special
item.description: In his new Netflix comedy special, "What Had Happened Was," Jamie Foxx reveals he had a brain bleed and a stroke.
